title: PHPzip_entry_close()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPzip_entry_close()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<?php
$zip = zip_open("test.zip");
if ($zip) {
while ($zip_entry = zip_read($zip)) {
if (zip_entry_open($zip, $zip_entry)) {
// some code
// Close directory entry
zip_entry_close($zip_entry);
}
}
zip_close($zip);
}
?>

practice_exercises.solution:
<?php
$zip = zip_open("test.zip");
if ($zip) {
while ($zip_entry = zip_read($zip)) {
if (zip_entry_open($zip, $zip_entry)) {
// some code
// Close directory entry
zip_entry_close($zip_entry);
}
}
zip_close($zip);
}
?>
